title: Gamemodes in Customs
body:
I was wondering when (if ever) custom game modes such as urf and one-for-all would be implemented back into the new client. During season 6 we were able to run 5v5 urf arams, but now we are unable to. Please get back to this whenever you can.

-FabianTheDank

replies.body: I don't have any info right now on whether or not those types of custom games will be returning or when, but you should post this over in General Discussion to see how the rest of the community feels!
